title: As a BOC, user I want to Start the Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
BOC Draft Day - https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_not_started
BOC  Draft Day - https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started
Club Draft Day - https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_draft_in_progress
Clock Controls - https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_clock_controls

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1423+Data+Discovery+-+BOC+Draft+Day
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Draft+day+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Start Draft" button on the Draft Day will start the Rule 4 Draft in the system.
* Clock controls will become active and match the provided wire
* The system will reload the Draft Day, and the "Start Draft" button will be replaced by "Pause Draft" button. 
* All currently open Draft Day screens should refresh to indicate that the Draft has now started. 
* The Picking ribbons on the the BOC and Club Draft Day and Draft Display screens will update to indicate that the Draft is in progress, and the first Org to pick will be highlighted.

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit a Drafted Players Position in the Draft Selections table
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_edit_draft_selection_position

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1522+Data+Discovery+-+Post-Draft

Acceptance Criteria: 
* BOC users with the EBIS-RULE4-POSTDRAFT-EDITORS permission will see a pencil icon on each row in the table
* The pencil icon is only enabled for the most recently completed draft.
* The pencil icon button will be disabled for previously completed drafts.
* Clicking the pencil icon will put its row into Edit mode and turn the pencil into a red cancel 'X'
* Clicking the 'X' icon will cancel the changes and return the row to view mode
* Only the Position column can be changed
* Anytime a row is in Edit mode, there is also a "Cancel All Changes" button and a "Save" button.
* No changes made will be stored until the user clicks "Save". Clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check per the provided data discovery.
* Once the required field check has passed, the system will store the changes, reload the widget in View mode, and display a blue successful save notification. 
* Clicking "Cancel All Changes" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen will refresh in view mode with no changes stored. If they do not confirm, the popup will close and the user will remain in edit mode with their changes persisting.

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit the draft logo when the draft is not in progress
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=adding_the_draft_logo

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1423+Data+Discovery+-+BOC+Draft+Day

Acceptance Criteria: 
* For BOC users with the EBIS-RULE4-POSTDRAFT-EDITORS permission, there will be a pencil edit icon on the Draft Logo
* The pencil icon will only be available when the draft is not in progress
* Clicking the pencil icon will open a file browser so the user can select a file
* Image must be a .png
* If the image is not a .png, throw an error
  - Title: Invalid file format
  - Body: Please upload your logo as a .png
  - Hint: Your logo should be saved with a transparent background to display correctly in EBIS.
 - If the image is a .png, the file will upload and it will be displayed in the logo preview

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to Draft for Org
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=drafting_a_player_for_a_club

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a BOC Draft Admin is viewing the BOC Draft Day screen and the Draft is in progress, there is a "Draft ID" box and a "Draft for Org" button per the wireframe. 
* The Draft ID field should only accept numbers. 
* Typing a number into this field and clicking "Draft for Org" will submit a pick on behalf of the Org that is currently picking. 
* When a number has been entered into the input add a blue x which clears the input when clicked
* Disable the pass button when 1 character exists in this input
* Clicking Draft for Org will clear the input and throw a blue success notification saying "[Last, First] drafted for [ORG]".

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to review a submitted player
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_player_selected

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Submitted Player" section available on the BOC's Draft Day screen. 
* When a player is submitted for approval to the BOC, their information is loaded into this section.
* The player information loaded will be the current year's Draft Record. 
* The player's primary position will display, but will be a dropdown field where the BOC can adjust the position of the player from this screen. 
* The Round, Overall and Org values should be populated according to the values for the current pick. 
* The pass button is disabled
* When this box is populated it has a box-shadow(0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)) and the border changes to #afcae1.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to approve a pass from the Draft Day
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Pass has been submitted for approval, the "Approve" button is enabled. 
* Clicking the "Approve" button will approve the Pass for the currently drafting Org. 
* The "Draft Selections" within the Draft Day screen will display the approved pass per the wireframe.  
* The current pick/ picking Org in the Pick Ribbon on the Draft Day screens for BOC and Club users will to the next Pick. 
* The current pick/ picking Org in the Pick Ribbon on the Draft Display screens for BOC and Club users will to the next Pick.

title: As a BOC user I want to see a Picking Ribbon at the top of the Draft Day and Draft Display screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display_-_draft_not_started
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display

Acceptance Criteria: 
* A picking banner appears at the top of the Draft Day screen for BOC users per the wireframe.
* The same banner appears at the top of the Draft Display screen
* If the current date is on or after the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, and the draft has not yet started, the Ribbon will display "The Draft has not yet started"
* If the draft is in progress, the ribbon will display the selection order for the current round
* If the Draft is completed and the current date is not on or after the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, then the banner does not display, and a "Draft completed" box displays

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to submit a pass on behalf of an Org from the Draft Day
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When there is no player currently submitted for Approval and the Draft is in progress, there is a "Pass" button enabled on the BOC Draft Admin's Draft Day screen. 
* If there is a player currently submitted for Approval, the Pass button is disabled.
* Clicking "Pass" will load "PASS" into the player box.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to approve a submitted pick
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_player_selected

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a player has been submitted for approval, the "Approve" button is enabled. 
* Clicking the "Approve" button will approve the entered pick. 
* The "Draft Selections" within the Draft Admin screen will display the approved pick as the most recent pick with the relevant player information. 
* The Picking Ribbons for both the BOC and the Clubs will move to the following Pick in the draft per the Draft Order. 
* The player will be crossed out in every Available Players list and Pick Queue that he currently appears in for all Orgs.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to see the Draft Selections on the Draft Day tab
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_player_selected

Acceptance Criteria: 
* On the "Draft Day" tab for BOC users there is a "Draft Selections" table. 
* If the draft is not in progress, and the current date is prior to the draft "flip" date, then the table displays the prior year's picks.
* If the draft is not in progress, and the current date is after the draft "flip" date, then the table is blank. 
* If the draft is in progress and no picks have been made, then the table is blank. 
* As players are approved, this table will update with the approved pick's information

title: As a Club user I want to see if a player is missing a Consent Form for the current Draft from the Available Players list
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_draft_in_progress

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Available Players table is loaded per story #151139070, then any players who require Consent to be re-drafted by the viewing Org that do NOT have a Consent Form with a status of "Approved" from the viewing Org will display an indicator that they are missing the consent form. 
* Clicking on the icon will show the text "Missing a consent to re-select form"

title: As a Club user I want to be able to select a player to draft from the Available Players screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_selecting_a_player

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Rule 4 Draft is in progress and the user has permission to draft players, then there is a "Select Player" button on the Available Players table. 
* Clicking on a row in the "Available Players" list will highlight the row. 
* When a row is highlighted, the "Select Player" button is enabled.
* Clicking "Select Player" will move the player into the "Selected Player" box, per the wireframe. 
* The players information will match the information displayed in the Available Players list for the currently viewing Club.
* Users will also be able to add a player to the Selected Player box by dragging and dropping a player from the Available Players list into the Selected Player box.
* Users will also be able to add a player to the Selected Player box by double clicking on a player from the Available Players list.
* Users should be able to load a new player into the Selected Players box, even if one is already there.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to see when a player has been Approved from the Draft Day screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_selecting_a_player (scroll down)

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a player is approved from the Draft Admin screen, the drafting Club's Selected Player data will turn green for 3 seconds and then fade out.
* "Awaiting Approval" text changes to "Player Approved"
* When a player is approved from the Draft Admin screen, the approved player will be crossed out in every Available Players list and Pick Queue that he currently appears in for all Orgs.
* The picking Org in the Pick Ribbon will update to the next Org in the draft order for the current round.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to submit a player
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_selecting_a_player

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When it is a Club's turn to pick, and there is a player loaded into the Selected Player box, the "Submit Player" button will be active (blue)
* Disables all buttons
* Removes the trashcan from the selected player
* Changes the black text "Selected Player" to grey text "Awaiting Approval"
* Changes the selected Player data to grey in Available Players, Pick Queue and the Selected Player areas.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to submit a Pass
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_submitting_a_pass

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When is a Club's turn to pick and there is no player currently selected for submission, and the Draft is in progress, there is a "Pass" button enabled on the Club's Draft Day screen. 
* If there is a player currently submitted for Approval, the Pass button is disabled.
* Clicking "Pass" will load "PASS" into the player box.
* Clicking submit with "PASS" loaded in the Selected Player box will submit the Pass to the BOC for approval

title: As a Club user I want to add a player to my Org's Pick Queue from the Draft Day screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=add_a_player_to_the_pick_queue

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Pick Queue is visible and enabled, then the user has the ability to drag and drop players from the "Available Players" table into the Pick Queue. 
* If the Pick Queue is visible and enabled, then selecting a row in the Available Players widget will  enable the"Add to Queue" button at the top of the Available Players table.
* Clicking "Add to Queue" will add the player to the Pick Queue at the bottom of the queue. 
* Every player in the Pick Queue will have a trash can icon associated with them. Clicking this icon will remove the player from the Pick Queue. 
* A Player can also be removed being dragged-and-dropped beyond the widget's borders
* The system will automatically store any changes made to the Pick Queue without the user needing to save.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to select a player to draft from the Pick Queue screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_selecting_a_player  (this wire is not pick queue specific but the same type of flow)

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Rule 4 Draft is in progress and the user has permission to draft players, then there is a "Select Player" button on the Pick Queue. 
* Clicking on a row that is not struck out in the "Pick Queue" will highlight the row. 
* When a row is highlighted, the "Select Player" button is enabled.
* Clicking "Select Player" will move the player into the "Selected Player" box, per the wireframe. 
* The players information will match the information displayed in the Available Players list for the currently viewing Club.
* Users will also be able to add a player to the Selected Player box by dragging and dropping a player from the Pick Queue list into the Selected Player box.
* Users will also be able to add a player to the Selected Player box by double clicking on a player from the Pick Queue.
* Users should be able to load a new player into the Selected Player box, even if one is already there.
* Users should be able to remove a player form the Selected Player box by clicking the trash can icon in the Selected Player box.

title: As a user I want approving a Draft Pick or Pass to update the Draft Display tab in real time
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display

Acceptance Criteria: 
* While the draft is in progress, if the Draft Admin approves a pick, or a pass, a user currently viewing the Draft History tab will see the newly approved pick reflected without needing to manually refresh the page.
* The picking Org in the Pick Ribbon will update to the next Org in the draft order for the current round.

title: As a Club user I want the picking banner to clearly reflect which picks are for my Org while the Draft is in Progress
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_draft_in_progress
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display

Acceptance Criteria: 
* A picking banner appears at the top of the Draft Day and Draft Display screen for Club users per the wireframe.
* Clubs see their pick with a white background and blue border until it's their pick

title: As a Club user, I want to see a Picking Ribbon at the top of the Draft Day screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_all_features_disabled
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_draft_in_progress


Acceptance Criteria: 
* A picking banner appears at the top of the Draft Day screen for Club users per the wireframe.
* If the current date is on or after the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, and the draft has not yet started, the Ribbon will display "The Draft has not yet started"
* If the draft is in progress, the ribbon will display the next 8 picks
* If the Draft is completed and the current date is not on or after the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, then the banner does not display, and a "Draft completed" box displays

title: As a user I want to be able to sort on the columns in the Draft History
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_history

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking on any of the column headers in the Draft History should sort the Draft History by the selected column.
